career.name: PreProd Corp
career.title: Data Analyst Intern
highlights: Built an end-to-end MLOps pipeline for food demand forecasting
Led 20 interns across 6 teams to ship 30+ demo projects
Created an AutoML MVP and ran a 2-day buildathon at VIT Bhopal
description: Designed and implemented an end-to-end MLOps pipeline for a food demand forecasting project using Kafka, DVC, MLflow, PySpark, and Scikit-Learn.
Developed demo projects for PreProdCorp's Opensrc initiative using PySpark, RAG, GAN, MobileNet, Redis, and CouchDB.
Organized and executed a 2-day "Buildathon" at VIT Bhopal; built the AutoML MVP, mentored participants, and evaluated submissions.
Led 20 interns across 6 teams, delivering 30+ demo projects under Opensrc using PySpark, Pandas, Polars, CV, RAG, and GANs.
Acted as Scrum Master, running sprints, ensuring delivery, and promoting MLOps best practices.
